title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1701.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1701.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, double-cell housing shall mean a
maximum or medium security cell (i.e., an individual self-contained space with
a controlled locking device secured from inmate access) originally designated
to accommodate a single inmate that has been equipped to accommodate two
inmates and has been inspected and approved by the SCOC for conversion to
double-cell use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1701.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
